title: Lauren Pazienza out on bail in case of New York City shoving death of Broadway singing coach - NBC News
content:
1. Lauren Pazienza out on bail in case of New York City shoving death of Broadway singing coach  NBC News
  2. Barbara Maier Gustern remembered at funeral as fatal shoving suspect Lauren Pazienza released on bail  CBS New York
  3. Parents Of Suspect In Shoving Death Of NYC Woman May Face Charges After She Spent 12 Days Hiding At Their Home  YourTango
  4. Accused NYC shover Lauren Pazienza may have opened her parents up to charges, expert says  New York Post
  5. Everything We Know About Lauren Pazienza, Suspect in Singing Coach's Death  Curbed
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News
description: Pazienza was being held at Rikers Island on a $500,000 cash bail or $1 million insurance company bond related to the death of 87-year-old Barbara Gustern.
